title: Diablo 4 dev "clears up some details" about its "rarest unique items"
description: Diablo 4's lead class designer shares tips about the action RPG's rarest unique items.

title: Diablo 4 and other Blizzard games DDoS attacks "have ended", says Blizzard
description: Blizzard has confirmed that the DDoS attacks that have plagued its games for most of the weekend are now over.

title: Starfield's physical editions will not include "physical discs"
description: A now-deleted tweet from Bethesda earlier today revealed that "there are no physical discs" and "all physical editions include a code for the chosen platform".

title: iPhone 15 design predictions: here’s what Apple’s next smartphones might look like
description: We detail the rumored design upgrades heading to the iPhone 15, iPhone 15 Pro and iPhone 15 Pro Max.

title: Huge leak reveals all about the Galaxy Z Fold 5 and Galaxy Z Flip 5
description: Ahead of their official unveiling next month, we've got all the details about these foldables that you'll want to know.

title: One of the largest Minecraft server hosting providers has a serious security issue
description: Server company behind popular games like Minecraft risked leaking its source code, potentially putting customers at risk.

title: The Google Pixel 8 may copy a key feature from the Samsung Galaxy S23
description: It looks as though the Pixel 8 and Pixel 8 Pro could support video out, and possibly a DeX-like desktop mode.

title: Quordle today - hints and answers for Sunday, June 25 (game #517)
description: Looking for Quordle clues? We can help. Plus get the answers to Quordle today and past solutions.

title: 5 upcoming foldable phones you could wait for instead of buying the Pixel Fold
description: Samsung, OnePlus, Xiaomi and more all have foldable phones still to come this year.
